original_text: All of you who speak messages from God have authority over your own spirits. All of you who speak messages from God have authority over your own spirits.
korean_text: 예언하는 자들의 영은 예언하는 자들에게 제재를 받나니

sentences.original_text: All of you who speak messages from God
have authority over your own spirits
All of you who speak messages from God
have authority over your own spirits
